reviews.review: 짝.짝.짝
Приходит компьютерный мастер к сироте и говорит: "У вас мать сдохла"

I think it's one of the best games ever made. And you should definitely pick it up when it's on sale.

+Novel idea to use portals
+Great story
+Great voice acting
+Funny
+Very good puzzles. They are right in the sweet spot, not too hard but not too easy.
+Graphics have aged well
+Not too long, took about 12 hours for me to complete the story 

- Not too good replayability as it is a puzzle game.

Головоломки интересные можно голову сломать (особенно в ко-оп режиме). Рекомендую всем.
游戏挺好，就是第一人称的3D玩儿得我头晕

v社老游戏了，以前知道很有名，趁着打折几块钱就入手了，非常推荐大家入手
优点：
1，对配置要求不高的同时画质也得到了保障。
2，优秀的剧情。
3，解密关卡设计的很有趣。
4，传送门的传送设定确实非常好玩，很有趣，很不一样的体验
缺点：
唯一的可以勉强叫缺点的吧，打到最后面，脑子有点疲惫，解不开关卡，卡关了。希望可以有点提示之类的。
总体来说非常推荐入手，原件不亏，打折血赚。
Хорошая игра развиваешь IQ и захватывающий сюжет рекомендую.
atakuuvaa

This simply is one of the best games I have ever played. A masterpiece sequel to the masterpiece original.
The singleplayer is great with a story that enthralls you and has guests like J. K. Simmons to make it all the more amazing. And the ending? I simply have never played a game with a more satisfying ending that feels like a genuine ending that I couldn't ask more from.
The co-op mode will certainly make you turn against your friend/partner. One does not simply play it without it eventually happening. It is a fun co-op that adds even more fantastic layers to an already fantastic game.
Ух, крутая игрушка
Bestes Spiel EU-West

What can I say about Portal 2 that hasn't been said before? It's a perfect sequel to Portal that sticks the landing in every way imaginable. The puzzles are well-designed and offer a challenge without feeling unfair or cheap. The story introduces new characters and gameplay concepts and it fits into Portal's universe seamlessly. This game is a definite must-play alongside the original Portal. Truly a masterpiece for the ages.

Я очень люблю игры, особенно ценю их за атмосферу и игровой опыт. Словами не передать, насколько крутая здесь и лиминальная(хотя в первом портале больше ощущается) атмосфера. Хорошие головоломки, хорошая озвучка и графика.
Обожаю игры от валв, надеюсь они продолжат когда-нибудь радовать нас новыми шедеврами
一代神作

Aunque en un principio pensaba que Portal era solamente un juego de puzzles, la historia es fascinante y los personajes entrañables, y lo que lo hace más sorprendente es que esta ligado al universo half life con el mitico Borealis.
El juego en concreto mejoro gratamente en comparación al primero, la ambientacion es maravillosa y ese sentimiento de estar solo con las máquinas me parece que le da un toque un poco inquietante. En mi opinión lo que hace de este una joya  es su mecánica de puzzles única con la que automáticamente relacionas el juego, la fabulosa narrativa que tiene y la calidad de los personajes y lo bien trabjados que están. Pasaras unas buenas horas resolviendo los rompecabezas ya que a comparacion del primer juego se agregaron muchas mas cosas como lasers, fluidos especiales y demás.

Portal 2 is one of, if not the best, singleplayer experiences I've played ever. Certain Parts feel like sharp difficulty spikes where things get much more confusing in chapters like the fall and the reunion, but I don't know if that's more the game having a spike in difficulty or my neanderthal monkey brain not seeing the patch of white in that one spot. Overall, the game is beautifully crafted. Not only is the singleplayer great, but the Co-op mode is just as fun.
9/10
